# raem

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`raem` provides a set of R functions to model steady-state single-layer groundwater flow using analytic elements.

## Installation

You can install the development version of raem from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cneyens/raem")
```
